basics.name: Nithin Gopalakrishnan Nair
basics.label: Research Engineer
basics.summary: I work on problems in Computer Vision. My research focus is on developing scalable computer vision algorithms. My research experience and interests are on generative models for video and image, Multimodal LLMs, Image foundation models and 3D perception.

work.name: Apple
work.summary: Developing multi-agent systems for human interaction understanding.

work.name: Google Beam
work.summary: Developed a transformer-based large-scale 3D reconstruction model for novel view synthesis. Conducted research on scaling 3D synthesis using synthetic data. Work resulted in a paper accepted at ICCV 2025 and a patent submission.

work.name: NVIDIA Research
work.summary: Conducted research on 3D perception leveraging Vision Foundation Models and Multimodal LLMs. Work resulted in a research paper and patent submission.

work.name: Adobe Inc
work.summary: Conducted research on diffusion-based image editing. Developed a training-free pipeline for interactive image editing.

work.name: Mitsubishi Electric Research Labs
work.summary: Conducted research on energy-based conditional generation. Developed a generalized framework for plug-and-play generation using unconditional diffusion models. Work resulted in a paper accepted at ICCV 2023.
